segment.source: Once submitted, you will be redirected to Google Captcha.
You can also reach me through social media:
• Make a Java project available on docker (from the image creation to the deployment)
• Index a database using Hibernate Search (Lucene indexes) to add typeahead to a search feature
• Implement other functionalities in an asynchronous team-based approach using the Kanban methodology
• Develop a Full Stack project using various DevOps tools and with an Agile approach
• Create a REST API backend accessing a database using Spring Data JPA (with Hibernate)
• Create an Angular frontend with an ag-Grid to display the data retrieved from the REST service
70 credits accumulated, Grading and Grade Point Averages (GPA) of 3,77/4,00
Mention of excellence from the General Director
KTH Royal Institute of Technology, Stockholm (Sweden)
Computer Science Master courses - English classes
• Design a SQL database according to the requirements of the Research & Development team
• Create the database and migrate data considering performance and long-term maintenance
• Transfer and refactor Unreal blueprints to c++
Project: Web application with data management
Second year team project at Polytechnique Montréal
• Design, develop and test an interactive web application (Front-end and Back-end)
• Use basic computer graphics and UI knowledge to make the site user friendly
• Save and recover user data from a NoSQL Database
First year team project at Polytechnique Montréal
• Build a system containing software and hardware components from a microcontroller card
• Produce a complete computer system with inputs/outputs and external peripherals
Technologies: AVR microcontroller and basic linux and shell scripting (Makefiles, GCC...)
Project: Development of a web chat application
• Develop an application communicating to a server through “Web Sockets” in HTML and CSS
Due to the academic level of excellence in college
• Create Smoke tests and unit tests in C# according to the needs of the Quality Assurance team
• Implement new functionalities while respecting the deadlines (sprints of two weeks)
College diploma in Computer Science and Mathematics
First prize from the collegial Department of Mathematics
Highest average score for all the courses in mathematics - Cohort of 2015-2017
Collegial final integration project at Collège de Maisonneuve
• Analyze, implement, and present the mathematical aspects related to the project
• Find and communicate bug reproduction steps to the development team
• Generate different graphs and statistics from data collected on customer satisfaction
• Knowledge of several programming languages (C#, Java…), frameworks (Spring, Angular…) and database management (SQL, Hibernate…)
• Work experience in different environments, international studies, and multiple team projects
• Strong team spirit, open-minded and ability to easily communicate
• Goal-driven, passion for technology and for learning!
• Agile (Sprints, Scrums, Pull requests, Code reviews)
• Unit tests, Smoke tests, Integration tests
• SQL, MongoDB, Sybase, Hibernate, Spring Data JPA
• Basic Linux and Shell scripting knowledge
Development of a web chat application

I'm currently in my final year of Software Enginnering at Polytechnique Montreal. Although I'm still at the start of my career, I've already had the chance of working amongst multiple really talented teams at Morgan Stanley, Ubisoft and other companies. I also had the great opportunity of studying abroad for a semester (at KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm, Sweden). I'm always looking to make more contacts and make new experiences, be it software related or not. BlaBlaBla this will change anyway.
You can download my CV here or look through the other tabs to see it organised in categories or chronologically. It's mostly the same information, simply different formats.
Don't hesitate to contact me for any reason using the link given below or on any of my social medias!
